segments.text: Good morning , doctor . I've been suffering very much from a toothache lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let me have a look . Will you sit down in this chair and open your mouth wide ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think one of the back ones at the top is giving me the most trouble .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This big one is badly decayed . I'm afraid it must be taken out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I hate having teeth pulled out . Will it hurt ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No need to worry . You won't feel anything at all . I'll give you an injection to stop the pain . Just wash your mouth out with this water , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it'll be over soon . Nurse , get some X-rays of our patient's molars . Then we'll start . Open your mouth wide . Don't be so nervous . Now open wider ... now stay , that's over ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet , but it soon will be . Now open again please ... It's out ! Look !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , really ! That was wonderful ! I felt no pain at all . Thank you , doctor .
segments.speaker: S1
